oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Making of Ride with Bob (undated)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Asleep at the Wheel (Musical group); Documentary films; Metal photoplates; Motion pictures; Television programs;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing The Making of Ride with Bob, a documentary film tribute to Bob Wills and the Texas Playboys. The Making of Ride with Bob is a television movie, which documents the making of Asleep at the Wheel's tribute album "Ride With Bob." Poster is undated and features a metal photoplate of Asleep at the Wheel.
